mapper.select: SELECT E.TMPLT_NUM, E.TMPLT_DVSN_NUM, E.TMPLT_NAME, E.TMPLT_CONT, D.TMPLT_DVSN_NAME, E.DEL_CHECK, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY TMPLT_NUM ASC) AS RNUM FROM(SELECT TMPLT_NUM, TMPLT_DVSN_NUM, TMPLT_NAME, TMPLT_CONT, DEL_CHECK,ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY TMPLT_NUM ASC) AS RNUM FROM DRAFT_TMPLT) E INNER JOIN DRAFT_TMPLT_DVSN D ON E.TMPLT_DVSN_NUM = D.TMPLT_DVSN_NUM
